In most of the regression analysis, we use initial characteristics of firms to control for the potential heterogeneity among our 2,750 firms. These controls, measured in 1993, are based on Return on Assets (operating income before depreciation (item #13) minus depreciation (item #14) divided by total assets (item #6)), Assets (item #6), Age measured as number of years since IPO, Leverage, 2-digit SIC codes and state of location. Finally, to ensure that our results are statistically robust, all variables defined as ratios are windsorized at the 5th percentile.20
